5087433.trustfund:
TF038618-CHINA:  YIXING PUMPED STORAGE PROJECT,TF026238-PHRD-YIXING PUMPED STORAGE
            HYDROELECTRIC PROJECT

repnme.cdata!:
China - Yixing Pumped Storage Project :
            environmental assessment

abstracts.cdata!:
The Yixing Pumped Storage Power Project,
            entails water resources development, consisting of two
            reservoirs, an underground power generating/pumping station,
            designed to sustain power during daily periods of high
            electricity demand, and installation of 35 KV transmission
            lines to connect to power grids. Construction of dams for
            both reservoirs, and of power pump facilities and
            substations, will cause not only the need for resettlement
            (discussed separately in the Resettlement Action Plan), but
            forest, and vegetation degradation, and soil erosion
            resulting from land leveling and blasting practices, in
            addition to ecological adversity in, and around the vicinity
            of construction sites, affected by water and air pollution.
            Mitigation measures during construction call for: adequate
            waste management practices for both liquid, and solid
            wastes; dust and emissions control will be enforced
            preventing noxious pollutant substances; daylight working
            schedules will be established to minimize noise
            disturbances; sanitization of the reservoirs will be
            conducted, in particular, vegetation removal will take
            place, to be restored once construction is complete. During
            project operation, to control adequate aquatic life, screens
            will be installed at the intake water pumping station;
            reservoirs will be enclosed, and protected from the public
            as a safety measure.

2040829.trustfund:
TF038618-CHINA:  YIXING PUMPED STORAGE PROJECT,TF026238-PHRD-YIXING PUMPED STORAGE
            HYDROELECTRIC PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Yixing Pumped Storage Project for
            China's development objective is to increase the
            overall efficiency of the power sector in Jiangsu Province
            in two ways: a) design and implementation of a restructuring
            of the power sector to further competition at the generation
            level and to provide large consumers access to generators,
            and b) construction of a pumped storage plant (4 x 250 MW)
            in Yixing to ease acute peaking problems and improve the
            generation mix that will create the conditions for more
            flexible dispatch and improved supply reliability an
            essential requirement for well-functioning competitive
            markets. The project components are: 1) construction of the
            Yinxing pumped storage power plant, a new upper reservoir,
            new main dam and subsidiary dam, and the underground
            powerhouse; 2) assistance to the restructuring of the power
            sector; and 3) construction of a double circuit transmission
            line to connect the Yixing pumped storage plant to the East
            China 500 KV network. The project will contribute to the
            Bank's energy sector strategy for China by assisting in
            making a smooth transition from a fully state-owned
            monopolistic sector to a diversely owned, market-oriented
            sector in which are promoted clean fuels, renewable energy,
            energy efficiency and assistance to poor western areas to
            develop their energy resources for local growth and export
            to other regions.

repnme.cdata!:
China - Yixing Pumped Storage Project :
            resettlement action plan

abstracts.cdata!:
Acquisition of land, and of other assets
            required for implementation of the Yixing Pumped Storage
            Power Project, will adversely affect the livelihood of
            people who live or earn their living on, or from the land
            selected for the project area. This resettlement action plan
            (RAP) identifies those project affected people (PAP), as
            those persons who have a property title, interest in
            structures, land, or any other asset; or persons who use the
            structures, land or assets as described above; or persons
            whose business, occupation, work, residence or habitat will
            be adversely affected; or, persons whose standard of living
            is adversely affected as a result of land acquisition. Based
            on consultations with PAPs, and following an assessment on
            statistical population data and socioeconomic conditions,
            the RAP sets the compensation framework as follows.
            Compensation for loss of houses, buildings or structures,
            will be paid at replacement costs; losses concerning crops,
            will be paid based on seasonal output values - no
            compensation will be paid for crops timely harvested, while
            lost crops, liable to be replanted will be compensated based
            on crop fees, and lost seedlings compensated at reasonable
            market prices; cultivated land will be compensated based on
            the mean output value of the three years preceding land
            appropriation, based on a threshold of up to 18,000 yuan per
            hectare; woodland compensation will be paid at six times the
            mean output value of cultivated trees of the last three
            years prior to appropriation; land compensation will be at
            replacement values; and, temporary losses will be
            compensated based on market output values. Collectives shall
            be responsible for resettlement, who will receive subsidies,
            or fees as insurance, based on a mutual agreement.
